price: 27 Salomon dit : « Nous allons voir si tu dis vrai ou si tu es une menteuse.
arabic: ۞ قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقۡتَ أَمۡ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qāla sananẓuru aṣadaqta am kunta mina al-kādhibīna
